sentences.en: An abuser may take both heroin and psychotropic substances during a given period.
sentences.cn: 个别滥用药物者在一指定期间可同时滥用海洛英及精神药物.

sentences.en: Drowning in sorrows , the heroin in the movie sobs with grief.
sentences.cn: 电影里那个女主角正不住地悲啼.

sentences.en: Floating population, such as migrant workers, are particularly vulnerable to the harm of heroin.
sentences.cn: 新吸毒人员仍在缓慢滋生, 特别是农民工等流动人员成为易染毒高危人群.

sentences.en: Is he providing hash and heroin to Mitchell?
sentences.cn: 是他提供海洛英给米契尔 么 ?

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate HIV infection status among heroin addicts in Liuzhou city.
sentences.cn: 目的··: 了解我市吸毒人群HIV感染的情况.

sentences.en: Objective order to assess addiction severity of heroin addicts.
sentences.cn: 目的评估自愿戒毒患者成瘾严重程度及其相关因素.

sentences.en: Probably he a heroin addict. That would explain why he was so weak.
sentences.cn: 也许他是个瘾君子, 这可以解释他为什么那么虚弱.

sentences.en: Result: There were 38.7 % heroin - addicted patients feeling drug craving during the session of investigation.
sentences.cn: 结果··: 在调查期间,有38.7%的被调查者有不同程度的药物渴求.

sentences.en: She was arrested for pushing heroin.
sentences.cn: 她因贩卖海洛英而被捕.

sentences.en: That poor guy has become emaciated from taking heroin.
sentences.cn: 那个男人因为吸白面儿已经瘦得不成人样了.

sentences.en: The memory impairment in heroin addicts was mainly the disorder of evocation.
sentences.cn: 记忆损害主要表现在再现能力障碍.

sentences.en: To study the management of femoral artery pseudoaneurysm caused by heroin injection.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨毒品注射所致股动脉假性动脉瘤的治疗方法.

sentences.en: When was he last off heroin?
sentences.cn: 他最近一次戒毒是什么时候.

sentences.en: Who in this world has ever been able to eliminate the abuse of opium and heroin?
sentences.cn: 吸鸦片烟、吃白面,世界上谁能消灭得了?

trans.tran_en: a powerful and illegal drug made from  morphine
